code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BuildCustomerPage=()=>{const[products,setProducts]=useState([]);const[productName,setProductName]=useState("");const[productPrice,setProductPrice]=useState("");const addProduct=()=>{setProducts([...products,{name:productName,price:productPrice}]);setProductName("");setProductPrice("");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"min-h-screen bg-gray-900 text-gray-100 p-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-6",children:"Build Customer Page"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl font-semibold mb-4",children:"Products"}),products.map((product,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-between bg-gray-800 p-3 rounded-lg",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["$",product.price]})]},index)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:productName,onChange:e=>setProductName(e.target.value),className:"px-4 py-2 bg-gray-800 border border-gray-700 rounded-lg",placeholder:"Product Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:productPrice,onChange:e=>setProductPrice(e.target.value),className:"ml-2 px-4 py-2 bg-gray-800 border border-gray-700 rounded-lg",placeholder:"Product Price"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:addProduct,className:"ml-2 px-4 py-2 bg-blue-500 rounded-lg hover:bg-blue-600 text-white",children:"Add"})]})]})]});};export default BuildCustomerPage;
